node.plaintext:
https://www.kdnuggets.com/2018/06/step-forward-feature-selection-python.html

https://aaronlelevier.github.io/intro-to-graphs/

Just came across this site full of interesting datasets: https://t.co/Plcfp0Oaxq 
 could be perfect for practice on #dataviz
[https://twitter.com/hashtag/dataviz?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw]  skills!

‚Äî Nathan Cheever (@data_cheeves) June 18, 2018
[https://twitter.com/data_cheeves/status/1008545580887334913?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw]
The sooner, the better! Skynet's not gonna build itself (well, arguably it will
after a certain point, but it'll take work to get it to that point! And that's
also something of a philosophical question regarding self-organization and
emergence). 
https://offspring.lifehacker.com/teach-your-kid-machine-learning-with-these-free-lessons-1826836113

Posted before, but now with updates! http://www.fharrell.com/post/stat-ml/
node.html:
https://www.kdnuggets.com/2018/06/step-forward-feature-selection-python.html

https://aaronlelevier.github.io/intro-to-graphs/

Just came across this site full of interesting datasets: https://t.co/Plcfp0Oaxq could be perfect for practice on #dataviz skills!

— Nathan Cheever (@data_cheeves) June 18, 2018

The sooner, the better! Skynet's not gonna build itself (well, arguably it will after a certain point, but it'll take work to get it to that point! And that's also something of a philosophical question regarding self-organization and emergence). https://offspring.lifehacker.com/teach-your-kid-machine-learning-with-these-free-lessons-1826836113

Posted before, but now with updates! http://www.fharrell.com/post/stat-ml/

node.plaintext:
2015 Aru Tag a friend who would like this. Follow @greentreepythons for more
pictures üêç Credit: Gary Elliott [https://www.instagram.com/p/Bj8PEtsBxV0/]

A post shared by üêç Green Tree Pythons üêç
[https://www.instagram.com/greentreepythons/]  (@greentreepythons) on Jun 12,
2018 at 3:21pm PDT

https://www.cybertec-postgresql.com/en/index-decreases-select-performance/

https://dsweb.siam.org/The-Magazine/Article/topological-data-analysis-1

https://github.com/DistrictDataLabs/yellowbrick

Yeah it's weird, we work a lot on how to prevent famines by doing ag better &
the answer is...

It's not a biology problem. Famines are man-made.

Folks tie themselves in knots re: how we need to farm differently or we'll
starve, but the #1 food security hack is "don't do wars." 
https://t.co/KVkOmlcLLm

‚Äî Sarah Taber (@SarahTaber_bww) June 17, 2018
[https://twitter.com/SarahTaber_bww/status/1008209414946467844?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw]
node.html:

https://github.com/DistrictDataLabs/yellowbrick

Yeah it's weird, we work a lot on how to prevent famines by doing ag better & the answer is...

It's not a biology problem. Famines are man-made.

Folks tie themselves in knots re: how we need to farm differently or we'll starve, but the #1 food security hack is "don't do wars." https://t.co/KVkOmlcLLm

— Sarah Taber (@SarahTaber_bww) June 17, 2018
